page.title: 19Farming in Killamarsh
page.content: On the farm they have got a lot of hay and animals such as pigs,cows, sheep,hens and dogs.The names are Sheba and Tim.Mrs.Abajam has got a tractor and a trailer and a combine harvester.They keep the pigs and cows and hens in stables.Some are round the back.In the summer they let the cows in to the fields.The sheep live round the back of the house.They live in a little hut so the lambs can go in.In Killamarsh there are a lot of fields.You sometimes see tractors on the roads because the farmers live there or they are delivering hay to people.The farming around Killamarsh is very mixed and farms have crops and animals.It is good living near farms and field because there is always something happening in them.You can always walk around the fields at holiday time to see the farmers.
